title: Minor Courses and Electives
content: Whats the scene with minors and electives. I am in 3rd sem CSE, and I wanna know which minors can I apply for, under which domains and who to contact, for the same??

comments.body:
1. You can apply for non-CSE branch minors. \[Don't take ECE xD\]
2. you can contact your Minors and Elective co-ordinator
3. Click this for Elective list RR Campus CSE for *2021-2025 batch* :  [Electives V sem (CSE)](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QRdeuiQ8VQzCVQelOvOnBUrNKDnEazQh/view?usp=drive_link)
